Scissors as a plant marker: Write the name of the plant on the blades and stick them into the soil. The plant's leaves will cover the blades, and you can easily identify the type of plant you have.
Scissors as a hair clip: Use the blades as a temporary hair clip to hold your hair out of your face while you work on a project or run errands.
Scissors as a hole punch: Cut a hole in the center of the blades and use them as a hole puncher for your paper documents.
Scissors as a zipper pull: Attach a small piece of string or yarn to the blades and use it as a zipper pull for your jacket or backpack.
Scissors as a bookmark holder: Attach a small hook to the tip of one of the blades and use it to hold your bookmarks.
